item.title: 2019/12: Interim look into pivotal clinical trials - why it matters and how to do it
item.description:
45 minutes guest session within the Introduction to Applied Mathematics and Informatics in Drug Discovery (AMIDD) lecture at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science at the University of Basel.
